column4: Ok, I'll tell you where I'm going with it.  The question was asked on the mailing list if it would be possible to host packages not included in Ubuntu for legal / licensing reasons extarnally.
That made me think of the PLF (Penguin Liberation Front), but they're Mandrake based.
So I was wondering if it would be easy to get the .rpm's from them and convert them
there a program called alien that can convert packages, AFAIK
